modName: New Windhelm House with Dungeon and Interactive Girls
summary: This mod is a new Hjerim house with some interactions with environment, girls with light specific dialogs etc...
descriptionHtml:
[font=Pristina][color=red][size=6][b]Windhelm, Hjerim[/b][/size][/color][/font]


[img]http://img11.hostingpics.net/pics/688939mainpicture.jpg[/img]




[color=red][u][b][i]1) Description[/i][/b][/u][/color]

When I walk in Windhelm, I think "It's a good city". But, a hot little corner to chill should be welcome.

Okay, purchase a house!
Bad news, a killer squat inside the last house in town. If you are able to kick out this man no problem. So, Chamberlain give to you a house for some buckets. You use the key and open a huge door.

Oh my god ! This is an ugly arrangement !

I go back to Whiterun.

No, no, no, Vastary's company is here for you ! Look at my plans :

-Change all the interior
-This house has been build above Nordic's ruins. We can do unique gallery.

[color=red][u][b][i]2) Prerequit[/i][/b][/u][/color]

You have to buy Hjerim House.
Some body Bodyslide, meshes, texture, faces for more fun and nude girls.

CBBE: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2666
And be 18+ or 21+

[color=red][u][b][i]3) Features:[/i][/b][/u][/color]

-1 Forge
-2 Bedrooms ( 6 beds )
-1 Kitchen
-1 Lab
-1 Dining room
-1 Living room
-1 Library
-1 Armory
-Nordic's ruins
-Little modifications in Breezehome

Some stuff are hidden, you must read books. There is a door with an access to the ruins but be carefull and play the roleplay! You don't need any of your skills, it's done a way if you have to die you die! Can't counter God mode but head's up to you.

[color=red][u][b][i]4)Install[/i][/b][/u][/color]

Copy all files in Skyrim's data folder.

You Wannamey'tO purchase a house ?

[u]Two options, another time, head's up to you :[/u]

-Finish "Blood on the ice", and become Thane.
You will need 12500 pieces for buy it and clean killer's stuff.

-Use the damn console,"Â²" and write "setstage 000a7b33 10". It's possible you will find some dirty objects on the floor, must have pay for the house! Collect them and find a trashbin, think like GreenPeace and thank to the dirty killer you could have beat the shit out of him.

[color=red][u][b][i]5) Thanks[/i][/b][/u][/color]

Thanks for downloading this old file. Should upgrade it a day
author: Vastary
